title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4064.8 - When amateur rider may obtain license to train
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4064.8 - When amateur rider may obtain license to train

State Regulations

On special application and under exceptional
circumstances, a license to train may be granted to an amateur rider only to
train horses owned by such rider and members of such rider's immediate family, without affecting his or her standing as such rider. When so licensed as a
trainer, he or she shall not be permitted to ride any other horses except those
he or she trained. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4064.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
